snippet.title: Monster Run - Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Monster Run releases on August 27th, 2024 on PC!

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2394300/Monster_Run/

Monster Run is a dark fantasy beat’em up with roguelite elements. Fight as a giant monster cat protecting your home forest. Destroy massive armies of human soldiers and their allies. Evolve your attacks, master non-human tactics, and discover the joy of breathing fire.

Stay up to date with Monster Run and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter:
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
